media_type.name: Zabbix-4_4-PagerDuty-Custom-Webhook
media_type.description:
Zabbix 4.4+ Webhook Media Type to PagerDuty Event API v2 and Rulesets
Media Type Customization Options
- Add additional Zabbix macros --> Add to both the parameter and to the script (into the appropriate event payload section and field
- Customize the PagerDuty Common Event Format (CEF) Fields. These show up on the PagerDuty Alerts tab in the UI and are useful for quick sorting and filtering. --> Source - {HOSTNAME} (default) --> Component - {HOSTNAME} (default) --> Group - Zabbix 4 (default) -->Class - Zabbix Event (default)
- Severity - As Zabbix events donâ€™t use the same event severity classifications required by PagerDuty, set the default severity level for all PagerDuty alerts. This can be critical, error, warning or informational. You can use ruleset rules to set a more appropriate severity during alert onboarding.
- summary_prefix : Create a business-aligned prefix for all PagerDuty incident title/description. This is ideally a Zabbix macro that contains the name of the service, application or other business aligned function monitored by Zabbix. This is the first thing seen in PagerDuty web or mobile app UI and notifications.
